Module kivakit.data.compression
Package com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression

Interface Codec<Symbol>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CharacterCodec, StringCodec, StringListCodec
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HuffmanCharacterCodec, HuffmanCodec, HuffmanStringCodec, HuffmanStringListCodec
    public interface Codec<Symbol>
    Interface to a compression codec, where codec stands for "Compressor / Decompressor". A Codec that can encode input symbols into an output byte array with encode(ByteList, SymbolProducer) and then decode the same bytes later with decode(ByteList, SymbolConsumer).

    The use of the SymbolProducer and SymbolConsumer interfaces is a design that improves performance by not requiring that collections be created or populated with encoded or decoded symbols. A different sequence interface like Iterable or Iterator was not used because several features beyond getting the next symbol are required for a codec.

    Compression and Decompression

    • SymbolProducer -> ByteList
    • ByteList -> SymbolConsumer

    This interface should be compatible with most compression algorithms, but it was designed to be suitable for Huffman (table-based, "fast") coding, as implemented by HuffmanCodec and FastHuffmanDecoder.

    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
    See Also:
    ByteList, SymbolProducer, SymbolConsumer, HuffmanCodec, FastHuffmanDecoder

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean canEncode​(Symbol symbol)  
      void decode​(ByteList input, SymbolConsumer<Symbol> consumer)
      Reads the compressed data in the input, calling the consumer with a sequence of decoded symbols
      ByteList encode​(ByteList output, SymbolProducer<Symbol> producer)
      Encodes the input symbols produced into the output

    • Method Detail

      • canEncode

        boolean canEncode​(Symbol symbol)
        Returns:
        True if this codec can encode the given symbol and false if it must be escaped

      • decode

        void decode​(ByteList input,
            SymbolConsumer<Symbol> consumer)
        Reads the compressed data in the input, calling the consumer with a sequence of decoded symbols
        Parameters:
        input - The compressed data to decode
        consumer - The consumer to call with decoded data

      • encode

        ByteList encode​(ByteList output,
                SymbolProducer<Symbol> producer)
        Encodes the input symbols produced into the output
        Parameters:
        output - The encoded data output
        producer - The source of symbols to encode
        Returns:
        The encoded data (the output parameter that was passed in)
